title: New: Pacific Air – Lose My Mind
body:
My oh my, a full 24 hours after we announce Pacific Air on our SXSW Stage, which you can RSVP to [here](http://darkparadise.eventbrite.com/), they only go and release a brand new track, entitled ‘Lose My Mind’.

A full three minutes that transpires into a beacon of hope for those of us currently stuck in the miserable climes of Winter, ‘Lose My Mind’ is Pacific Air at their best, and it will leave you thinking forward to the wonders of Summer.

For those of you fortunate enough to be heading to SXSW, and in doing so temporarily skip over Spring, Pacific Air will be performing 3-3:30pm on March 13th at B D Riley’s.
